recent_news: Raized.ai is a Swiss startup using AI and data analytics to help VC investors find early-stage unicorns — deal sourcing engine for investors
Backed by SICTIC, Swissnex, Kickstart Accelerator, BlueLion Incubator; total funding $243K (pre-seed)
Venturelab featured Raized.ai as example of AI for VC — exploring Asian firms desire for data-driven startup selection
Focus on making early-stage investing smarter via data, AI and analytics
enrichment_data.outreach_angle: Penny is building AI infrastructure for VC deal sourcing — a direct strategic overlap with ATX (Agentic Trust Exchange) which mediates professional collaboration via AI agents. Reach out noting that ATX's agent-based compatibility evaluation could extend Raized.ai's deal matching layer. Also, Nitara (Focus Flow OS) as a SaaS product for founders could be relevant to Raized.ai's portfolio company support toolkit. Given the Venturelab connection, this could also open introduction to Swiss VC pipeline.
